name: Home Sweet Dice
description:
You play as Zika, a tiny spider who lives inside a 20-sided die. Everytime the die is rolled, she has to try to prevent her possessions from being smashed.

(Also, Zika's favorite number is 1, and loves it when the 1's face is at the top of her house)

Input: Keyboard

Team Zika:

  • Edwin "Teddy" Dykhoff
  • Phoenix Stroh
  • Daniel "Walker" McDonald

Known Bugs:

  • All objects of a type flash whenever any single object of that type is about to fall, rather than just the single object (ex: if one vase is about to fall, all vases will flash rather than just that one)
  • Sometimes objects will not blink before they fall.
